articles.author: Latha Venkatesh
articles.title: Some power stocks surge, but is the power sector on the road to recovery? - CNBCTV18
articles.description: What’s going right is that the power sector has been seeing some slow but incremental reforms. So, is the power sector finally sustainable on the path of reform and financial recovery? This is what these three experts have to say.

articles.title: Borrowing costs may come down from Q3: Mahindra Finance's Ramesh Iyer - Business Standard
